dataset_id: MODIS/Terra Clear Sky Radiance Statistics Daily L3 Global 25km Equal Area
title: MODIS/Terra Clear Sky Radiance Statistics Daily L3 Global 25km Equal Area
summary: The MODIS/Terra Clear Sky Radiance Statistics Daily L3 Global 25km Equal Area (MODCSR_D) product contains global, 25-km resolution, daily average data composited from the 5-minute L2 MODCSR_G product.  Nine clear-sky radiance and reflectance statistics (bands 1-7 and 17-36, see description of the MODCSR_G product for description of statistics) are produced for day and night separately, including observed minus calculated data for bands 20, 22-25, and 27-36. Also, included are numbers of land vs. water observations in each 25-km bin. Ideally, there are 288 5-minute granules of L2 data used as input to the MODCSR_D process.  One file is produced for each calendar day.  The MODCSR_D files are in Hierarchical Data Format (HDF).
